value.content:
[
  {
    "type": "deprecated_algorithm",
    "severity": "high",
    "algorithm": "SHA-1",
    "description": "SHA-1 is deprecated due to collision vulnerabilities and is no longer considered cryptographically secure for signatures or integrity checks.",
    "evidence": "SHA-1 initialization vectors found at 0x943e8-0x943f8",
    "recommendation": "Replace SHA-1 with SHA-256 or SHA-3 for all security-critical applications"
  },
  {
    "type": "deprecated_algorithm", 
    "severity": "critical",
    "algorithm": "MD5",
    "description": "MD5 is deprecated due to significant collision vulnerabilities that compromise its cryptographic integrity.",
    "evidence": "MD5 initialization constants found at 0x943e8-0x943f4",
    "recommendation": "Immediately replace MD5 with secure hash functions like SHA-256 or SHA-3"
  },
  {
    "type": "deprecated_algorithm",
    "severity": "critical", 
    "algorithm": "RC4",
    "description": "RC4 is a deprecated stream cipher with known cryptographic weaknesses and biases in its keystream.",
    "evidence": "RC4 initialization pattern found at 0x141742, Key scheduling algorithm (KSA) pattern detected at 0x1c5",
    "recommendation": "Replace RC4 with modern stream ciphers like ChaCha20 or use AES in CTR mode"
  },
  {
    "type": "weak_algorithm",
    "severity": "low",
    "algorithm": "XOR Cipher",
    "description": "XOR encryption is an extremely weak encryption method that provides no real cryptographic security.",
    "evidence": "XOR encryption loops detected for ARM at 0xb7, XOR encryption loops detected for MIPS at 0x34e5",
    "recommendation": "Replace XOR encryption with standard encryption algorithms like AES"
  }
]
